attributes.action: Advanced Psychological screening for all police officers and new applicants.
attributes.additional_details: Advanced psychological screening for all police officers including new applicants to detect misogynistic or racist views, in order to safeguard the public and police officers alike who have suffered from institutional racism, steps for Advanced psychological screening must be introduced for all police officers and new applicants in order to restore public confidence and to help protect the integrity of our police service.
attributes.background: Advanced psychological screening for all police officers including new applicants.

rejection.details:
Currently screening of new police officers is a matter for individual police forces and professional policing bodies.

We could accept a petition calling for new legal requirements for additional screening of police officers and applicants, but it would need to be clear what requirements you wanted to be imposed.
